posts.raw_content:
I've watched enough of the left and the right. Mostly the left here (i'm in Portland now), and how their protests have gone completely flat and impotent. 

This isn't like previous times 2020 or before.  Social media has killed their message.

Because it is just a performative, show now.  A show for influencers and a show for a few on the ground who want to make loud noises, but times have changed.

These protests aren't moving the needle for the left.  They are doing nothing to change public opinion.  They are solely for those interested in
theater, watching a few loud mouth imbeciles think they are defeating others with a Youtube stream.

Its the end for the left. They don't impact anyone. 

Charlie Kirk impacted thousands and thousands, because what he did was actually involve people in a transaction of ideas.

Keep doing this on the right, because the left can be loud but they impact almost no one with their show, their loud mouth look at me protests. 

It does not win the day.
